SQL_STMT_U.val: DELETE FROM GL_JURNALD WHERE JOURNAL_NO not IN ( select JOURNAL_NO from gl_jurnalh )
update GL_JURNALH set STATUS='P' where CO_ID=':1' and BR_ID=':2' and FISCAL_YEAR=:3 and PERIOD_NO=:4 and status='O' and debit_home=credit_home

update GL_JURNALD set STATUS='P' where CO_ID=':1' and BR_ID=':2' and JOURNAL_DT between ':3' and ':4' and status='O' and JOURNAL_NO IN ( select JOURNAL_NO from gl_jurnalh h where CO_ID=':1' and BR_ID=':2' and FISCAL_YEAR=:3 and PERIOD_NO=:4 and status='P')

SELECT ACCOUNT_NO,COST_CENTER,D.CURR_ID,D.CURR_RATE,SUM(d.DEBIT_CURR) DEBIT_HOME,SUM(d.CREDIT_CURR) CREDIT_HOME FROM gl_jurnald d,gl_jurnalh h WHERE h.CO_ID=':1' and h.BR_ID=':2' and h.JOURNAL_DT BETWEEN ':3' AND ':4' AND h.STATUS='P' and d.journal_no=h.journal_no GROUP BY ACCOUNT_NO,COST_CENTER,D.CURR_ID,D.CURR_RATE

SELECT b.account_no,sum(b.ending_13) saldo FROM GL_BALANCE b,oact o where B.CO_ID=':1' AND B.BR_ID=':2' AND FISCAL_YEAR=:3 AND o.AcctCode=b.ACCOUNT_NO and o.ActType<>'R' and o.ActType<>'E' GROUP BY b.account_no
